key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the catalog import file was successful ('+CatalogWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the catalog import file failed. Error: '+CatalogValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + CatalogValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Catalog import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Catalog import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the pricebook import file was successful ('+PricebookWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the pricebook import file failed. Error: ' + PricebookValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + PricebookValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Pricebook import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Pricebook import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the inventory import file was successfull ('+InventoryWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the inventory import file failed. Error: ' + InventoryValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + InventoryValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Inventory import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Inventory import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("The validation of the library file import("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") file was successfull ("+SlotValidateWarningCount+" warnings).",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Import libraries file("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") was not successfull"+(ErrorMsg!=null?" ErrorMessage:"+ErrorMsg:"")+".",'WARN')
CWCI.addMessage("Import libraries file("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") was successfull"+(ErrorMsg!=null?" ErrorMessage:"+ErrorMsg:"")+".",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Content import finished : no files found",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Content import finished with error: Can't access Input Folder("+CWCI.getParameterValue('inputFolder')+")",'ERROR')
CWCI.addMessage("The validation of the slots file import("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") file was successfull ("+SlotValidateWarningCount+" warnings).",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Import slots file("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") was not successfull ErrorMessage:"+ErrorMsg+".",'WARN')
CWCI.addMessage("Import slots file("+CurrentFile.fullPath+") was successfull. ErrorMessage:"+ErrorMsg+".",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Slots import finished : no files found",'INFO')
CWCI.addMessage("Slots import finished with error: Can't access Input Folder("+CWCI.getParameterValue('inputFolder')+")",'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the customers import file was successful ('+CustomersWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the customers import file failed. Error: ' + CustomersValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + CustomersValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Customers import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Customers import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the active data import file was successfull ('+ActiveDataWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The active data import failed. Error: ' + ActiveDataImportErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the active data import file failed. Error: ' + ActiveDataValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + ActiveDataValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Active data import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Active data import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Starting import of custom objects file ' + CustomObjectsFile.getName() + '.','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the custom objects import file was successful ('+CustomObjectsWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the custom objects import file failed. Error: ' + CustomObjectsValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + CustomObjectsValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Custom objects import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Custom objects import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Starting import of order tracking data file '+OrderTrackingFile.getName()+'.','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The order tracking import failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Order tracking import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Starting import of Nike OMS data file '+NikeOMSRequestsFile.getName()+'.','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The Nike OMS import failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Nike OMS import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Starting import of order tracking data file '+OrderTrackingFile.getName()+'.','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The order tracking import failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Order tracking import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The order tracking import failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The order tracking import failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the stores import file was successful ('+StoresWarningCount+' warnings).','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('The validation of the stores import file failed. Error: ' + StoresValidationStatus.code + ' / ' + StoresValidationStatus.message,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Stores import finished. " + Errors + " data errors and " + Warnings + " data warnings. See log for detail.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Stores import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Genesco Inventory Feed PreProcess failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Inventory Feed processing finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('EMEA Perpetual Inventory Process failed. Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('Begin reading and processing VerifyEmployees data file '+VerifyEmployeesFile.getName()+'.','INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("VerifyEmployees file import finished. No import files found.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage('ProcessEmployeeRecord order tracking import failed for '+ Record + ' Cause: ' + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
